60 template <class PointType>
61 void nimbus::Filters<PointType>::voxelGrid(const boost::shared_ptr<const pcl::PointCloud<PointType>> &blob, pcl::PointCloud<PointType> &res)
62 {
63  pcl::VoxelGrid<PointType> vox;
64  vox.setInputCloud(blob);
65  // Leaf Size is 3cm
66  vox.setLeafSize(0.01f, 0.01f, 0.01f);
67  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr filCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
68  vox.filter(*filCloud);
69  pcl::copyPointCloud(*filCloud, res);
70 }
71 
72 template <class PointType>
73 void nimbus::Filters<PointType>::movingLeastSquare(const boost::shared_ptr<const pcl::PointCloud<PointType>> &blob, pcl::PointCloud<PointType> &res)
74 {
75  typename pcl::search::KdTree<PointType>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<PointType>);
76  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr tempCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
77  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr cloud (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
78  std::vector<int> indices;
79  this->voxelGrid(blob, *tempCloud);
80  pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*tempCloud, *cloud, indices);
81  pcl::MovingLeastSquares<PointType, PointType> mls;
82  mls.setInputCloud(cloud);
83  mls.setSearchRadius(0.03);
84  mls.setPolynomialFit(true);
85  mls.setPolynomialOrder(2);
86  mls.setUpsamplingMethod(pcl::MovingLeastSquares<PointType, PointType>::SAMPLE_LOCAL_PLANE);
87  mls.setUpsamplingRadius(0.01);
88  mls.setUpsamplingStepSize(0.005);
89  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr filCloud (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
90  mls.process(*filCloud);
91  pcl::copyPointCloud(*filCloud, res);
92 }
